H0.text: Dragonflies landing on lily pads is the best example of competition between species in a pond environment.

H1.text: Frogs and toads eating flies is the best example of competition between species in a pond environment.

H2.text: Lizards and snakes lying in the sun is the best example of competition between species in a pond environment.

H3.text: Hawks eating mice is the best example of competition between species in a pond environment.

A4.text: Birds, bats, frogs, lizards, dragonflies and spiders are among the predators of flies.
